channel.title: The Hat Decides Podcast
channel.itunes:summary:
The Hat Decides Podcast.
Unlimited topics. No point.
Three idiots and occasional guest-hosts discuss topics suggested by the listeners.
It's unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterly irrelevant.
Email your suggestions to be entered into the hat to thehatdecides@googlemail.com
channel.itunes:author: The Hat Decides
channel.description:
Three idiots discuss topics suggested by the listeners.
It's unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterly irrelevant.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Three idiots and occasional guest-hosts discuss topics suggested by the listeners

item.title: Stranded Island again Part III
item.description:
Three idiots discuss topics suggested by the listeners. Its unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterley irrelevant.

Thank god its the last episode of the Stranded Island Songs Part III.

Dont forget to wait till the end to hear a dedicated version of Barbera Dickson and Elaine Paige "I knew him so well" - Yes I did just write that!

You can email us on thehatdecides@googlemail.com

Twitter us on www.twitter.com/thehatdecides
item.itunes:subtitle: The Hat Decides Podcast

item.title: Phones in your eyes!?
item.description:
Three idiots discuss topics suggested by the listeners. Its unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterley irrelevant.

Matt decides he wants to put suggestions into the hat. This was a mistake but it ends up in a quickfire round!

Then by popular demand (by us) its the new game show "TV anthems sung by Animals"

We are so sorry!

You can email us on thehatdecides@googlemail.com

Twitter us on www.twitter.com/thehatdecides

item.description:

So there is a twist on this episode, we have some friends over from the other side of the Atlantic to do a ComicOnLine podcast in the UK.

What happens?

We take over and ruin it and turn it into The Hat Decides!

Beware though, them QPAW boys love to talk about comics...

You can email us on thehatdecides@googlemail.com

item.title: The Hat Decides Xmas Episode 82
item.description:
Merry Xmas to one and all!

Three idiots discuss topics suggested by the listeners. Its unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterley irrelevant. 

We chat about our xmas experiences and then discuss the following subjects

1. LampCat ( yes.. we dont know what it is either! )

2. If you could cancel Xmas, what would we replace it with?

3. Wrapping present? Paper and Bows or Newspaper and selotape?

You can email us on thehatdecides@googlemail.com

Twitter us on www.twitter.com/thehatdecides

item.description:
Three idiots discuss topics suggested by the listeners. Its unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterley irrelevant.

This weeks subjects is..

item.title: The Hat Decides Podcast Episode 67
item.description:
This week we have a guest host 

Three idiots discuss topics suggested by the listeners. Its unrehearsed, unedited, unimportant and utterley irrelevant.

This weeks subjects is..

1. Have we ever wondered what it would be like to be born the other sex?

2. If you ever had to write a guide for something, what would it be?

3. When you masterbate with soap are your hands clean or dirty?

We also test the Guest Host on his home town laws!

You can email us on thehatdecides@googlemail.com

Twitter us on www.twitter.com/thehatdecides
